title: Chapter 270: Threaten
body:
Chapter 270: Threaten

Chapter 270: Threaten


Along with ‘xiu’ sound of wind breaking, that special kunai in the right hand of Ren Tianyou directly shot out from his hand towards that screen.


And just when that screen was about to hit by this kunai, a pure white holy light suddenly appeared, firmly protecting this screen by stopping this kunai.


After that with a “peng” sound, this kunai directly fell on the floor from the midair, and firmly stabbed on the floor beside the screen.


The sudden appearance of this holy light immediately attracted the attention of Bu Feng, couple with Ren Tianyou’s words “using illusion to control this girl” of just a moment ago, a radiance of hope again kindled in his already dead heart. “Don’t tell me that everything was the scheme of these damned bastards of Light Temple?”


With the appearance of that holy light, Fang Qian standing at the side of Bu Feng immediately swung her dagger again stabbing towards the chest of Bu Feng.


And as for Bu Feng, because of God Shackling Water, he was basically unable to exert even a little bit of strength. So sitting on the ground physically paralyzed, he could only look helplessly at Fang Qian stabbing towards him with her dagger.


But at this critical moment, a figure suddenly appeared between them, and the hand of Fang Qian which was holding the dagger was held by a sturdy hand. Carefully looking, if this person was not Ren Tianyou, then who else it could be.


After holding the right hand of Fang Qian, Ren Tianyou reached out his right hand’s index and middle finger towards her forehead.


“Don’t harm her!” Seeing the movement of Ren Tianyou, Bu Feng who was sitting on the ground physically paralyzed immediately roared anxiously. He believed that Ren Tianyou wanted to harm Fang Qian. And at the same time, from behind the screen, a figure suddenly appeared and quickly rushed towards Ren Tianyou.


“Kai!” Ignoring the roar of Bu Feng, Ren Tianyou directly placed the fingers of his right hand on her forehead, then circulating the chakra within his body, he immediately undid the illusion. After the illusion was undid, the expression in her eyes suddenly began to change, revealing a confused expression.


And at that moment, that figure of a person had also already arrived in front of Ren Tianyou. But after undoing the illusion of Fang Qian, Ren Tianyou immediately pulled Bu Feng with his left hand and used Hiraishin to appear next to the window, where he had stuck a special kunai in advance.


After three people stabilized themselves, the saw the figure appeared inside the room was a mature middle-aged woman wearing white colored bishop clothing, and her body was emitting mature charm.


“Who on earth are you? Actually daring to ruin my good deed!” Looking at Ren Tianyou, this woman coldly said to Ren Tianyou.


“I am Zero of Akatsuki, and this Bu Feng is member of my Akatsuki organization, so how can I watch him being killed by you?” Looking at this middle-aged mature woman in front of him, Ren Tianyou slowly said. “Now who are you, don’t you think it’s too contemptible doing this sort of thing relying on your Intermediate God King realm strength?


“Hey, when did I………” Hearing Ren Tianyou, Bu Feng by his side suddenly roared.


But before he finished speaking, the voice of Ren Tianyou was transmitted into his ear. “If you don’t want to die together with your this little lover, then don’t speak too much nonsense.”


Hearing Ren Tianyou, the expression of Bu Feng gradually became sober and clam while looking towards Fang Qian, then the gloomily thought, “Forget it, for Qing’er, I will eat loss this time. Once my strength restores, I will immediately take Qing’er and fly away from here. With my speed, you won’t be able to do anything to me.”


But what Bu Feng don’t know was, once he stepped into this “pirate ship”, how could he easily escape form it.


“Humph, my name is Ji Ruyue, am second generation Holy Maiden of Light Temple.” This middle-aged woman who was second generation Holy Maiden of Light Temple Ji Royue stared at Ren Tianyou with eyes full of killing intent. “Regardless of who you are, daring to intervene on my Light Temple’s matter, I think you are too impatient to die.”


As a matter of fact, this woman, second generation Holy Maiden of Light Temple Ji Ruyue was there from the first day when Bu Feng had stepped into this pavilion for the first time, so she had already discovered the existence of Bu Feng. But the speed of Bu Feng was too fast, and she understood that even she herself wouldn’t be able to stop him from leaving.


As a result, after considering for a long time, in today’s circumstance, in accordance with her plan, she used illusion to control Fang Qian, making her to secretly poison Bu Feng, and in order to punish Bu Feng, she intentionally controlled Fang Qian to say those words to Bu Feng.


And the most important thing was, after Bu Feng died, he won’t be able to come to see Fang Qian, so after a long time, she might even forget Bu Feng, and concentrate her attention to become the Holy Maiden of Light Temple.


But this plan was completely ruined by Ren Tianyou. With the illusion level of Ji Ruyue, how could it hide the truth from the Sharingan of Ren Tianyou?


And while Ren Tianyou and Ji Ruyue were confronting each other, Fang Qian also completely awoke form illusion, then she instantly discover Bu Feng by her side, “Eh, Little Feng, why are you here? What’s wrong with you? How come you are sitting on the floor motionless ah?”


“I’m fine, Qing’er, you don’t need to worry. This time I have come to take you away from this place.” Bu Feng shook his head, then said with a smile. He didn’t say anything about the matter of her giving him poison just a moment ago so as to avoid making her feel bad.


“Humph, leave, none of you can leave this place today.” Hearing Bu Feng, Ji Ruyue coldly said while her beautiful eyes staring at Bu Feng with ill intention.


“You two, go outside and wait.” Ren Tianyou said to Bu Feng and Fang Qian behind him, then turning around and looking at Ji Ruyue, he said, “Hand over the antidote of God Shackling Water, don’t force me to take it myself.”


Ren Tianyou had stayed here, naturally because he wanted the antidote for God Shackling Water, otherwise he would have already taken both of them and use Hiraishin to leave this place.


“It’s impossible for you to make me hand over the antidote!” Hearing Ren Tianyou, Ji Ruyue disdainfully laughed. “Furthermore today you and this brat will not leave from here.”


“Ai, it seems there is no choice but to use force.” Hearing Ji Ruyue, Ren Tianyou merely shook his head because he had already expected this answer, then he stamped in the front with his right leg while suddenly releasing huge amount of chakra. This momentum directly strike towards Ji Ruyue, and the floor around suddenly became full of cracks.


“What?” Feeling the huge pressure from Ren Tianyou, Ji Ruyue suddenly exclaimed in surprise, then she also released her powerful momentum to firmly withstand the momentum’s strike of Ren Tianyou.


“Humph!” Seeing Ji Ruyue had blocked his momentum, Ren Tianyou just snorted coldly. Then looking at the special kunai which he had used to block the dagger of Fang Qian, stabbed on the floor next to Ji Ruyue, he slightly smiled. After that he disappeared from that place and instantly appeared by the side of Ji Ruyue, then under her surprise as well as disbelief look, rasengan quickly appeared in his right hand which hit towards her abdomen.


“Humph! Holy Light Shield!” At the time of imminent peril, Ji Ruyue immediately used a rank 8 light defense magic, safely blocking the rasengan of Ren Tianyou. And Ji Ruyue immediately borrowed the impact force of rasengan to withdraw and retreat.


“That was a close call!” After stabilizing her body, Ji Ruyue immediately wiped cold sweat on her forehead with lingering fear inside her heart. Just now in an instant, she was nearly injured seriously, fortunately she reacted timely.


“What do you think, now do you still think you can kill me?” Looking at retreated Ji Ruyue, Ren Tianyou sneered. “It would be best for you to hand over the antidote quickly, otherwise even though I can’t kill you in a short time, I can still change your Light Temple into ruins within fraction of a minute. Furthermore you should be clear that with our level, it is easy to do what I have mentioned just now.”


Hearing the threat of Ren Tianyou, the face of Ji Ruyue slowly sank. Although she was unwilling to admit, but she was clear that what Ren Tianyou had said just now was a fact. If he really want to destroy Light Temple, then she would basically be powerless to stop him.


In their level, every one of their movement contains huge amount of power and influence. No need to mention this small Light Temple, even this entire Radiance capital city, if given enough time, they could easily change it into a pile of debris.


“Do you really want to be enemies with our Light Temple? Although you are very powerful, but don’t forget, if we want to kill you, then that is also not impossible.” Ji Ruyue stared at Ren Tianyou with eyes filled with killing intent, then said.


“I have already stated, this fellow if member of my Akatsuki organization, and we Akatsuki never let anyone bully and humiliate us.” Saying this, Ren Tianyou looked towards Bu Feng, then said, “Hey, what do you think, isn’t the things I said right?”


“Yes, we Akatsuki aren’t afraid of any enemies!” Seeing the meaningful glance of Ren Tianyou, Bu Feng had no choice but to say this against his will, while thinking, “Wait until I get the antidote and the recovery of my strength, then I will see how you will chase me.”


“I will give you antidote.” Ji Ruyue was clear that if she didn’t gave antidote today, then this matter would not end easily like this, so she had no other choice but to take out antidote from her space ring and threw it towards Ren Tianyou.


“Hope you gave me a real antidote, else you will know my means. Let’s go.” Ren Tianyou accepted the antidote and slowly said a sentence. After that turning towards Bu Feng and Fang Qian, he said.


“Wait a minute, you can’t take Fang Qian away.” Seeing Ren Tianyou wanted to take away Fang Qian too, Ji Ruyue immediately panicked. She was very clear about the blood lineage of Fang Qian, so for making her drop the idea of leaving here forever, she had arranged this drama of today, so how could she let Ren Tianyou take her away.


But her movement however was slow, as Ren Tianyou had already placed his hands on the shoulder of both Bu Feng and Fang Qian, and immediately launching Hiraishin no Jutsu, he disappeared from there with both of them.


Seeing the disappearance of Ren Tianyou and others, Ji Ruyue gnashed her teeth and said, “Akatsuki, I will definitely make you die without a place for burial.”
